abstract: The Justice Department is examining Apple’s tactics in the digital music market, according to several people.
snippet: The Justice Department is examining Apple’s tactics in the digital music market, according to several people.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — The Justice Department is examining Apple’s tactics in the market for digital music, and its staff members have talked to major music labels and Internet music companies, according to several people briefed on the conversations.

headline.main: Apple Is Said to Face Inquiry About Online Music
headline.print_headline: Apple Is Said to Face Inquiry On Its Online Music Tactics
